Note.P: Influence in my FAMILY and NEIGHBORHOOD
Note.Q: You will be my witnesses in Jerusalem...
Return home and tell how much God has done for you. So the man went away and told all over town how much Jesus had done for him.
Note.P: Influence in my CITY and STATE
Note.Q: You will be my witnesses in Jerusalem, and in all Judea and Samaria...

For I was hungry and you gave me something to eat, I was thirsty and you gave me something to drink, I was a stranger and you invited me in, I needed clothes and you clothed me, I was sick and you looked after me, I was in prison and you came to visit me.
You will be my witnesses in Jerusalem, and in all Judea and Samaria, and to the ends of the earth.

Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
